answer: That's what he said.

question: Well...
answer: Good of him to keep in touch.

question: How're you doing? Blane's Okay. Billy's Okay, Pinky called, he...
answer: Yeah, yeah, what there was a change in Plans...? You couldn't get to me to tell me?

question: Let my wife go.
answer: Do you mind if I say something personal?

question: What is your real name?
answer: It's Rumplestiltskin.

question: You had to go out on a limb -- you had to go out on a limb, Didn't you...? Didn't you...
answer: Let the girl go, I'll give up the gold.

question: Yeah, we had, basically, we had in mind a different deal... a different deal. How bout that, I hear, if you're flexible, it Keeps you Young.
answer: I'll give up the Gold, Me and the girl leave on the boat.

question: Well, that's very sentimental. But what if the gold's on the boat.
answer: Search the boat.

question: Hold on, hold on, let's siddown...
answer: Oh, yeah, let's siddown. You fucken dog inna manger, we sit here a little long enough, the Boys in Blue come visit, n'there goes the neighborhood...

question: One second. Hold on...
answer: You're bust, Baby. You got Broke... go cry a little You fortunate motherfucker, she don't step up, you're gone stay here, for, like, a little bit of forever...

question: Take the gold. Take the gold off, leave me the boat.
answer: Don't make me lose my respect for you. By the way, we already had the gold. Pincus gave it up. That's what she traded for your life. Yeah, we don't want, to send you out there broke... here

question: I just did. Hey, you can't worry about every little thing...
answer: Too bad about Pinky.

question: Ain't that so.
answer: ...always made me laugh.

question: Well, what more can you say of anyone?
answer: Nothing...

question: Yeah?
answer: Why'd they call him Robert "The" Bruce...

question: ...what?
answer: Why'd they call him Robert "The" Bruce?

question: Because he asked them to.
answer: Y'go to that Plastic Surgeon, don't lettem put you all the way under. I knew a guy in Statesville, went to get his face fixed, woke up, sucker'd given him a pair of tits.

question: Yeah, that's no bargain.
answer: Well, he landed back inside, he never had to want for Cigarettes...

question: Send your cut there...?
answer: Wire it there, when you get where you're going.

question: That I will, Pal.
answer: I hear it's nice down there in the Sun.

question: Zat where I'm going?
answer: Wherever it is, Brother, don't come back.

question: Yeah, I knew you'd show.
answer: Good, good plan, baby...

question: Yeah, I wouldn't clear my throat, without a backup plan...
answer: That's the right way to do it.

question: End of the day, though, end of the day, what's the important thing...?
answer: That's right.

question: What's the important thing...?
answer: Shame about Pinky...

question: You heard.
answer: Y'all loaded up?

question: C'mon, get in, we'll talk on the road. You heard about Pinky...
answer: Yeah. I heard. I'm sorry about that.

question: Yeah, well, it just went bad there, that little bit. Dinnit...?
answer: Yes, It did.

question: ...yes, it did... it got kind of convincing.
answer: ...and, so, you got hurt.

question: Well, you can't do it halfway, can you...?
answer: No, anything you do, you got to do full-out. Don't you?

question: Indeed you do.
answer: And, sometimes...

question: Then, that's just the Price.
answer: That's right. That's what you taught me. That's part of it.

question: Well, but didn't you do great. Played it down to the last recorded syllable...
answer: I went to a good school.

question: Never seen it done n'y better. You hotwalked that dude so good.
answer: ...thank you, Joe.

question: Cooled him out the livelong day. You made it look so real.
answer: Well, you know...

question: ...what d'you mean, "that's part of it?"
answer: I don't get you?

question: I was talking about Pinky.
answer: Uh huh.

question: I said we paid the price. And you said. We paid part of it.
answer: Yes. That's right.

question: Was it...? Well, you can't think of everything. I'm sorry.
answer: Well...

question: I'm sorry...
answer: You knew it was over... Cause it's over. It's all done. That's the deal.

question: He ain't gonna shoot me?
answer: No.

question: Then he hadn't aughta point a gun at me. Well, no. You told me, "you knew him before."
answer: That's right. I did.

question: You said that.
answer: Hmm.

question: It was a pretty plan, though, wunnit...?
answer: Cute as a Chinese baby...

question: Thanks for everything.
answer: You'll be alright.

question: You think so?
answer: You always are.

question: Well, I missed this trick, though, didn't I...?
answer: ...the best laid plans of mice and men...

question: ...what?
answer: I said Nobody's Perfect.
